templates.content:
Unfortunately, we are unable to make changes to an order once it has been placed. 
This includes changes to the size color or adding items to an order. 

Generally orders cannot be cancelled once they are placed, however there are a few situations where we may be able to process a cancellation.

If you would like to confirm whether your order falls within out cancellation window, please send your request to cancel via this link https://shop.darcsport.com/pages/contact  Be sure to send your request as soon as possible. Once an order begins processing no changes or cancellations can be made.
